TopicTitle: Live coverage of Antarctic annular eclipse starts soon

Articles.Content: For anyone who's interested, Slooh is hosting live coverage of the Antarctic annular eclipse, starting in about an hour from the time of this writing. Supposedly it will also be visible as a partial eclipse from parts of Australia. Maybe someone from down that way will post pictures here?
If I didn't have to wake up at 5:20 tomorrow...
eh thanks man, gonna check it out. Gotta love people on those forums, keep pointing me into the direction of cool live streams of stuff, launches, eclipses
